titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on ethene, tetrafluoro, oxidized, polymerized reduced, methyl esters, reduced.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/9/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on ethene, tetrafluoro, oxidized, polymerized reduced, methyl esters, reduced.
